short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making it easier to catch planes on the map.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Map Logger by RadarAtlas is an easy to use tool to automatically log aircraft on ADSB sites. This is especially helpful in conjunction with the ADSB replay feature - just start the logger and when you come back later, all the aircraft that flew across your screen will be logged for you.
